import React, { Component } from "react"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import AuthenticationService from "../todo/AuthenticationService.js"; import QnADataService from "../../api/qnaService/QnADataService.js"; import moment from "moment"; class AddQuestion extends Component { componentDidMount() { if (this.state.id === -1) { return; } let username = AuthenticationService.getLoggedInUserName(); QnADataService.retrieveQnA(username, this.state.id).then(response => this.setState({}) ); } validate(values) {} onSubmit(values) { let username = AuthenticationService.getLoggedInUserName(); console.log("username is " + username); let questionAnswerTO = { id: this.state.id, createdBy: this.username, createdDate: moment(new Date()).format("YYYY-MM-DD"), language: values.language, topic: values.topic, subTopic: values.subTopic, question: values.question, answer: values.answer, difficultyLevel: values.difficultyLevel }; if (this.state.id === -1) { console.log("I am inside if block !"); QnADataService.createQnA(questionAnswerTO); } else { console.log("I am inside else block !"); QnADataService.createQnA(questionAnswerTO); } console.log(values); } render() { return (

Add Question

Language Topic Sub-Topic Question Answer Difficulty Level
); } } export default AddQuestion;
